name: Baffled Brawl
description:
This is our teams game jam project (Hosted by Seattle Indies). The theme for this year was "Unexpected Results". We started by brainstorming a HMW question and then filter out between over 80 ideas, to reach something we can achieve in 48 hours span of the game jam. Please download and play our game and give us your feedback.

Thankyou

Erfan, Pouria, Kasra
